ghostPage.title: About
ghostPage.excerpt:
> a boy who grew up looking at the Mikly Way and dreamed of making a spaceship
then travelling in space is arleady confronted with the reality of his late
forties. It sounds like a sad story but the boy thinks of the good memories of
the past and pledges to cherish the remaining time.
I am ...
born and live in Yongin, Korea
Love to learn new things making me passionate
Exercise everyday so as not to be lazy
Amateur coding, taking photos, drone photography

I like ...
Family, Camping, Sauna, Mang

authors.name: Daegyun Na
authors.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

primary_author.name: Daegyun Na
primary_author.bio: "The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes"

ghostPage.plaintext:
> a boy who grew up looking at the Mikly Way and dreamed of making a spaceship
then travelling in space is arleady confronted with the reality of his late
forties. It sounds like a sad story but the boy thinks of the good memories of
the past and pledges to cherish the remaining time.
I am ...
born and live in Yongin, Korea
Love to learn new things making me passionate
Exercise everyday so as not to be lazy
Amateur coding, taking photos, drone photography

I like ...
Family, Camping, Sauna, Mangsang Beach located in East sea of Korea, Starscraft,
IT device, Drone, Photograph, Looking at the stars in winter

I dislike ...
Bad smell, cheating, Laziness, lack of manners

MBTI
ISTJ-T (06.2020)
ESTJ-T (01.2021)

Education
Dual major of Materials Science & Engineering and Business Administration

Current interests
GraphQL, Javascripts, Linux, Drone photography, IoT, Train travel in Canada

Past interests
Camping in New Zealand, Family trip in EU, Smart Farm, Autonomous driving,
Electric Vehicle, Python, Jekyll, Hugo, Wordpress, Markdown, Markup, Camera,
Speaker, Audio, Mercedes Benz SLK, Bowers & Wikins, Camping, Learning German,
Vehicle dynamics, Physics, coffee roasting, Photoshop, what eles?

Work experience
Experienced as engineer and project manager in automotive since 2003.

For more information, visit Linkedin [https://www.linkedin.com/in/daegyunna/] 
for work experience andFacebook [https://www.facebook.com/nadaegyun] or 
Instagram [https://www.instagram.com/daegyun_na/] for daily life.
